verses.roman:
viṁśati paricchede-sanātanera milana
tāra madhye bhagavānera svarūpa-varṇana

synonyms: viṁśati paricchede—in the Twentieth Chapter; sanātanera milana—meeting with Sanātana Gosvāmī; tāra madhye—within that; bhagavānera—of the Supreme Personality of Godhead; svarūpa-varṇana—description of personal features.
translation: In the Twentieth Chapter the Lord's meeting with Sanātana is described. The Lord described the personal features of the Supreme Personality of Godhead in depth.
